content: भिक्ष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (भिक्षते, भिक्षित) {@--1@} To ask, beg or ask for (with two <ab>acc.</ab>), भिक्षमाणो वनं प्रियां <ls>Bk. 6. 9.</ls> {@--2@} To beg (as alms); न यज्ञार्थं धनं शूद्राद्विप्रो भिक्षेत कर्हिचित् <ls>Ms. 11. 24</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">25.</ls> {@--3@} To ask without obtaining. {@--4@} To be weary or distressed. {@--5@} To obtain.
